LiveTab.RefreshIntervalDescription: Defines how often the value should be updated (in seconds)
LiveTab.MetricDescription: Choose the metric that should be displayed in the browser tab
LiveTab.LastMinutesDescription: The counter will display the number of last N minutes
LiveTab.InvalidMetric: The given metric is not available.
LiveTab.SettingsIntroduction: Here you can define your custom LiveTab settings. If you change your settings, it does not effect any other users.
